entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
